pullRequest.title: Decouple commons dependency
pullRequest.bodyText:
Removed azure-cosmos source dependency on external commons packages (commons-io, commons-collections4, commons-text).
Created a local package
com.azure.cosmos.implementation.apachecommons that contains only necessary commons types. The azure-cosmos source types are updated to use types from this package.
The non-shipping packages, sample, benchmark, and test will continue to take a dependency on external commons packages.

commit.message: example, benchmark projects: taking explcit dependency on commons
azure-cosmos: adding local package 'apachecommons'  with trimdown version of necessary commons types.
azure-cosmos: Remove source dependency on commons types and using local 'apachecommons' types instead.
